title: Ticket #594: CondorView collector should track arbitrary fields
description:
The collector, as part of the CondorView functionality, can take snapshots of interesting information from MyType=Machine ClassAds. This should be generalized to snapshot arbitrary attributes from arbitrary typed ads, as specified by the configuration file. Frequency of sampling should be variable as well, possibly on a per-result basis.

#595, "Store CondorView database in more generic format" is probably a prerequisite

Step 1: Figure out what sorts of questions we want to ask

Fields wanted from #573:

  • Number of jobs submitted: SELECT SUM(TotalJobAds) WHERE MyType="Scheduler"
  • Number of jobs completed: TODO
  • Number of jobs held: SELECT SUM(TotalHeldJobs) WHERE MyType="Scheduler"
  • For each Condor and Globus job status, calculate the following:
    • Total time spent in status X across all jobs: TODO
    • Number of jobs that spent time in status X: TODO
    • Average and other statistics about time spent in status X: TODO
    • Histogram of times spent in status X: TODO

Wild brainstorming for sorts of data to snapshot (in pseudo SQL)

  • machines per user: SELECT username, COUNT(*) GROUP BY username WHERE MyType="Machine"
  • Total RAM: SELECT SUM(Memory) WHERE MyType="Machine"
  • Most RAM: SELECT MAX(Memory) WHERE MyType="Machine"
  • Least RAM: SELECT MIN(Memory) WHERE MyType="Machine"
  • Average RAM:
    • SELECT SUM(Memory)/COUNT(*) WHERE MyType="Machine"
    • SELECT AVG(Memory) WHERE MyType="Machine"
